0.text: Innate: Thresh's armor cannot increase through growth (per level).
0.html: Innate: Thresh's armor cannot increase through growth (per level).

1.text: Innate: Enemy  champions, large  minions and large  monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls while lesser minions and monsters have a 33.3% chance to drop a Soul.
1.html: Innate: Enemy champions, large minions and large monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls while lesser minions and monsters have a 33.3% chance to drop a Soul.
markedPassages: champions
minions
monsters

2.text: Thresh automatically collects Souls near him or a placed  Dark Passage.
2.html: Thresh automatically collects Souls near him or a placed Dark Passage.
markedPassages: Dark Passage

3.text: Soul: For each stack, Thresh gains  1 ability power and  1 bonus armor.
3.html: Soul: For each stack, Thresh gains  1 ability power and  1 bonus armor.
markedPassages: 1 ability power
1 bonus armor

0.text: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming  unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
0.html: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
markedPassages: unable

1.text: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage and  stun and  reveal them for 1.5 seconds, as well as reduce Death Sentence's  current cooldown by 3 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is  slowed by 20% for 1 second.
1.html: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage and stun and reveal them for 1.5 seconds, as well as reduce Death Sentence's  current cooldown by 3 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is slowed by 20% for 1 second.
markedPassages: stun
reveal
current cooldown
slowed

2.text: While the target is  stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds,  pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a  minion or  monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.
2.html: While the target is stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds, pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.
markedPassages: stunned
pulling
minion
monster

3.text: Recast - Deathly Leap: Thresh  dashes to the Shackled enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast  Dark Passage and  Flay during the dash.
3.html: Recast - Deathly Leap: Thresh dashes to the Shackled enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. He can cast Dark Passage and Flay during the dash.
markedPassages: dashes
Dark Passage
Flay

0.text: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location over 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds while he remains nearby and granting  sight of its surroundings. If Thresh moves too far away from the lantern, it returns back to him immediately.
0.html: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location over 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds while he remains nearby and granting sight of its surroundings. If Thresh moves too far away from the lantern, it returns back to him immediately.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a  shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it,  dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
1.html: Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, dashing to Thresh and gaining the shield.
markedPassages: shield
dashing
Soul

2.text: An ally cannot select the lantern while  immobilized,  grounded, or  silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with  Deathly Leap.
2.html: An ally cannot select the lantern while immobilized, grounded, or silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with Deathly Leap.
markedPassages: immobilized
grounded
silenced
Deathly Leap
possibleConcerningAbilities: An ally cannot select the lantern while  immobilized,  grounded, or  silenced. The lantern will not expire from Thresh moving too far away if he is dashing with  Deathly Leap.

0.text: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.
0.html: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing over 10 seconds without basic attacking enemies.
markedPassages: AD
Soul
Soul

1.text: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage and  knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then are  slowed for 1 second.
1.html: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage and knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then are slowed for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocked
slowed

0.text: Active: Thresh erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing magic damage and  slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Thresh erects a pentagon of spectral walls around him that each last for 5 seconds. A wall will break upon enemy champion contact, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: Enemies that break a wall cannot do so again for 1 second. Subsequent walls they break will deal no damage and  slow for only 1 second.
1.html: Enemies that break a wall cannot do so again for 1 second. Subsequent walls they break will deal no damage and slow for only 1 second.
markedPassages: slow

textContent.text: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming  unable to move or attack while it is in flight.
textContent.html: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

textContent.text: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage,  reducing Death Sentence's cooldown by 3 seconds, and  stunning and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is  slowed by 20% for 1 second.
textContent.html: The scythe catches the first enemy hit to deal magic damage,  reducing Death Sentence's cooldown by 3 seconds, and stunning and revealing them for 1.5 seconds. Thresh will also mark the target Shackled for 1.5 seconds, during which he is unable to declare basic attacks, and is slowed by 20% for 1 second.

textContent.text: While the target is  stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds,  pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a  minion or  monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.
textContent.html: While the target is stunned, Thresh tugs twice over 0.8 seconds, pulling the target a short distance with each tug. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability while the target is Shackled, which will cause him to stop tugging.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain across the ground in a broad line and a radius around him, starting behind him and towards the target direction. Enemies hit are dealt magic damage,  knocked 200 units in the target direction, and then  slowed for 1 second upon landing.
